sample_chosen:
<observation>The applied force is $12\,\mathrm{N}$ and friction opposes with $5\,\mathrm{N}$.</observation>
<insight>Net force is the difference: $F_{\text{net}}=12\,\mathrm{N}-5\,\mathrm{N}$.</insigh...
sample_rejected: You just subtract the friction from the pull: $12-5=7\,\mathrm{N}$. Simple enough!
